title: VERTICAL FARMING TOMATOES ON AN  AEROPONIC TOWER #hangingtomatoes #tomatoes

tasks.task: Demonstrate the growth progression of Sakura tomatoes in an aeroponic tower garden.
subtasks: Set up the aeroponic tower garden.
Install the necessary components for the aeroponic system.
Plant the Sakura tomato seeds in the aeroponic tower.
Monitor the initial growth of the tomatoes.
Apply proper watering and nutrient solution to the aeroponic system.
Adjust the system to ensure optimal air circulation.
Wait for approximately three months for the tomatoes to mature.
Continue harvesting tomatoes for several months to enjoy the generous yield.
